SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository

Interface ProductRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductRepositoryImpl
public interface ProductRepository
ProductRepository is an interface for performing operations related to products, including methods for finding, adding, updating, and retrieving product details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addByPID(String pid, ProductDTO product)
    Adds a new product to the database with the specified product ID (PID).
    List<Product>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all products available in the database.
    ProductDTO
    findByPID(String pid)
    Retrieves a product by its unique product ID (PID).
    Product
    findByProductName(String name)
    Finds a product by its name.
    List<ProductDetailedDTO>
    findProductDetails(List<String> swpid_list, List<String> productid_list, List<WholesalerProducts> wholesaler_products)
    Retrieves detailed product information based on a list of wholesaler products IDs product IDs and wholesaler products
    com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot
    getUrlByName(String ProductName)
    Retrieves the URL of a product's image based on its name.
    void
    updateByPID(String PID, Map<String,Object> data)
    Updates an existing product based on its product ID (PID) with the provided data.

  • Method Details

    • findByPID

      ProductDTO findByPID(String pid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a product by its unique product ID (PID).
      Parameters:
      pid - the unique product ID
      Returns:
      a ProductDTO containing product details
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findAll

      List<Product> findAll() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves all products available in the database.
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects representing all products
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findProductDetails

      List<ProductDetailedDTO> findProductDetails(List<String> swpid_list, List<String> productid_list, List<WholesalerProducts> wholesaler_products) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves detailed product information based on a list of wholesaler products IDs product IDs and wholesaler products
      Parameters:
      swpid_list - a list of wholesaler product IDs
      productid_list - a list of product IDs
      wholesaler_products - a list of WholesalerProducts objects
      Returns:
      a list of ProductDetailedDTO containing detailed product information
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • addByPID

      void addByPID(String pid, ProductDTO product)
      Adds a new product to the database with the specified product ID (PID).
      Parameters:
      pid - the unique product ID
      product - a ProductDTO containing details of the product to add

    • updateByPID

      void updateByPID(String PID, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates an existing product based on its product ID (PID) with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      PID - the unique product ID
      data - a Map containing the fields to update and their new values
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findByProductName

      Product findByProductName(String name) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds a product by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product
      Returns:
      a Product object representing the product with the specified name
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getUrlByName

      com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot getUrlByName(String ProductName) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the URL of a product's image based on its name.
      Parameters:
      ProductName - the name of the product
      Returns:
      a DocumentSnapshot containing the product's image URL
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
